This Github repository's contains R code that was used to produce figures and statistical analysis underlying the GBE article "Hunting for beneficial mutations: conditioning on SIFT scores when estimating the Distribution of
Fitness Effect of new mutations".
All R code is made available as .rmd files. These can be used and reused freely.
